title: Win It Weekly: A Pair of Shimano’s New S-PHYRE
content:
How does Win It Weekly work?

Simply fill out the form below for your chance to win a pair of Shimano’s new S-PHYRE RC902 road competition shoes.

Prize:

  • Shimano S-PHYRE RC902 – one pair
  • MSRP US$425

Prize Details:

The winner will receive one pair of Shimano’s flagship road shoe, the RC902, in the color of their choice (subject to availability). Every aspect of the S-PHYRE shoe is designed to maximize power transmission and comfort. The RC902 debuts a new 360-Degree Surround Upper design which cradles your foot and delivers a slipper-like connection to the pedal. BOA Li2 closures offer on-the-go micro adjustment while a new heel cup is built to handle the intense twisting forces caused by explosive accelerations.
author: CyclingTips
